channel.title: Spotify on The BBJProjeK Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spotify on The BBJProjeK Blog

item.title: Get Old Spotify UI back (Permanent)
item.description: The new Spotify look is nice, but everything is shifted around. This makes navigating Spotify awful. Fortunately, there is a way to get the old Spotify back. Classic VS XPUI Design Step 1. Downloading and Installing Old Spotify Version First, you will need to install and old Windows Spotify version of Spotify, 1.1.51.380 works for the new and the old design. Download Spotify 1.1.51.380 (Uptodown) / Google Drive Mirror Once download, install the program.
